title: Introduction to Software Engineering
description: Requirements, specification, design, implementation, testing and verification of large software systems. Study and use of the software process and software engineering methodologies; working in project teams. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory. Not open to students with credit in CSC/CPE 308.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: CSC/CPE 103 with a grade of C- or better, and CSC/CPE 357.
